creator: Pandai.org
descriptionHtml:
Learning now is easy with Pandai! Designed specifically to support school students and stimulate learning.

Pandai helps students to learn continuously with interactive quizzes and instant feedbacks. Practice daily, track performance, collect rewards, and achieve higher scores in exams.

Aimed to replace piles of workbook and exercise books, Pandai is a hub of smart learning contents that are perfectly aligned to the KSSM & KSSR standards set by the Ministry of Education (MOE) of Malaysia. So you can use Pandai to complement the school syllabus.

The contents are mapped to MOE's 'Dokumen Standard Kurikulum & Pentaksiran' (DSKP) and are divided by age group, subject, chapter, topic, subtopic, and mastery level.


PREPARE FOR EXAMS
- Practice regularly and learn from mistakes and explanations, encouraging long-lasting learning.

INCREASE CONFIDENCE
- Get instant feedback from interactive questions and collect rewards, enabling good learning habits.

TRACK LEARNING PROGRESS
- Revisit past quizzes, monitor test results, and analyse performance statistics by subjects.

ACHIEVE HIGHER SCORES
- Enhance critical thinking abilities and develop understanding of core concepts, improving school grades.


Get the Pandai app now!
Download the mobile app to join the Pandai learning community and start learning.
descriptionShort: Learn continuously via daily quizzes and score in school exams, UPSR, PT3 & SPM

Pandai helps students to learn continuously with interactive quizzes and instant feedback. Practice daily, track performance, collect rewards and achieve higher scores in exams.

Aimed to replace piles of workbook and exercise books, Pandai is a hub of smart learning contents that are perfectly aligned to the KSSM & KSSR standards set by the Ministry of Education (MOE) of Malaysia. So you can use Pandai to complement the school syllabus.

The contents are mapped to MOE's 'Dokumen Standard Kurikulum & Pentaksiran' (DSKP) and are divided by age group, subject, chapter, topic, subtopic, and mastery level.


PREPARE FOR EXAMS
- Practice regularly and learn from mistakes and explanations, encouraging long-lasting learning. Get ready for your school exams, UPSR, PT3 & SPM

INCREASE CONFIDENCE
- Get instant feedback from interactive questions and collect rewards, enabling good learning habits.

TRACK LEARNING PROGRESS
- Revisit past quizzes, monitor test results, and analyse performance statistics by subjects.

ACHIEVE HIGHER SCORES
- Enhance critical thinking abilities and develop an understanding of core concepts, improving school grades.


Get the Pandai app now!
Download the mobile app to join the Pandai learning community and start learning.
descriptionShort: Learn continuously via daily quizzes and score in school exams, UPSR, PT3 & SPM

title: Pandai

creator: Pandai.org
descriptionHtml:
Practice Mathematics, Science, History, Pendidikan Islam, English to Bahasa Melayu questions everywhere. Access more than 20 subjects to learn plus various maths and science competition questions.

Join over 400,000 Malaysian students using Pandai to revise their subjects accurately with fun game-like experiences. 🚀🚀🚀
Whether at the beginning of the semester or preparing for SPM, use Pandai to revise confusing subjects in a fun gamified experience.

Improve your learning on these subjects:
English
Mathematic
Sejarah
Science
Bahasa Melayu
Bahasa Cina
Pendidikan Moral
KAFA
Pendidikan Islam
Economy
Geografi
Physics
Biology
Chemistry
Perniagaan
Prinsip Perakaunan
Sains Computer
Asas Sains Komputer
Reka Bentuk dan Teknologi
Olympiad - Mathematic
Olympiad - Junior Science
Olympiad - Earth Science
Olympiad - Astronomy
Olympiad - Economic
Kijang Economics Competition
Kangaroo Math Competition
Kancil Science Competition
Beaver Computational Thinking Competition

We have been featured on Bernama, TV3, RTM, Astro Awani, The Edge, Malaysiakini, Sin Chew Daily, Techcrunch, Tech in Asia, Digital News Asia, and Vulcan Post!

With Pandai, you can:

⭐ Practice Everywhere and Anytime 🚌

Practice your subjects in an easy, less than 5 minutes exercises that you can do everywhere! (unless maths and science subjects, of course 😁)

⭐ 250k of questions with explanations to practice 😍

Train yourself with thousands of questions with varying difficulty on different subjects and levels. Never run out of questions to practice on!

⭐ Learn From Your Mistake 🤔

Gain confidence in knowing which topic you need to practice more with our intelligent learning feedback. Don't start from zero! Practice confidently with knowing where you need to improve and learn more!

⭐ Super Fun Learning Experience ✈

Get coins if you finish the quiz. With the leaderboard feature, earn badges by completing challenges and challenge yourself with other students. School practice has never been this fun!



⭐ Beautifully Designed Questions and Explanations Graphic 😘

Get beautiful and clear graphic explanations and questions that make you want to learn more!

⭐ Instant Access to Multiple Exercises (Easy for All Levels)

Get access to multiple exercises you can do at any time of the day or night. You can practice on your own or study with our partner students. With the partner students, you will access all the questions and answers in one place!

⭐ Daily Challenge and Challenging Exercise

Explore a new topic daily by completing quizzes and flashcards. Pandai will challenge you with different questions based on your knowledge. The quizzes are fun, challenging and interesting. You will learn more about the topic you focus on by completing each quiz level! The quizzes and flashcards are available for all subjects, including math, science, history, and more!

⭐ Get rewards and prizes for participating in the quizzes and exercises.

Collect coins as you practice, and you will get a reward for completing the quizzes and an extra bonus for completing your homework. Use your coins to redeem rewards from Roblox, Mobile Legends Diamond, Starbucks, KFC, Tealive, Shopee and more.

You might want to consider that when answering a question, it will be a good idea to repeat it by making several different choices. Even if your answer is good, it may not be enough for your teachers because they may ask for more information or examples or references instead of specific examples or references.

Learning with fun games. Learn sejarah. Learn matematik. Fun and free learning app. Practice more and easily today!
descriptionShort: Get access to more than 250,000 questions and explanations to practice!

With live tuition for all subjects across all grades at a single price, you are sure to get value for money. Plus, our class recordings allow a tailored and personalized learning experience, making knowledge absorption more effective.

Access immediate, concise notes for all subjects absolutely free and experience uninterrupted learning. Our ad-free environment is designed to maintain your focus and concentration, leading to optimized learning outcomes.

Cut through the uncertainties and join the winning team now! With Pandai, you're not just studying; you're strategically preparing for success. Chase your brighter future by starting your Pandai journey today.
